text: The Flamingo Kid is a 1984 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Garry Marshall and starring Matt Dillon, HÃ©ctor Elizondo, Richard Crenna, Janet Jones, Jessica Walter, Brian McNamara, Fisher Stevens, Leon Robinson, John Prine, Steven Weber, Richard Stahl, Sian Webber, Marisa Tomei. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was the fifth movie to released with a PG-13 rating. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 comedy- drama movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:1984 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Garry Marshall Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Manhattan
title: The Flamingo Kid
